Sets whether the dual quantity will be automatically calculated when the base quantity is changed. This parameter is only used for in depended processes like stock corrections, inventory, partial amount transport and so on.- DisabledNo dual quantity is calculated. The user has to enter the dual quantity.- EnabledThe dual quantity is calculated and cannot be overwritten by the user.- EditableThe dual quantity is calculated and can be overwritten by the user.

Allows user to edit the remaining quantity in base quantity units. If the base quantity unit and the warehouse quantity unit are the same, this setting is ignored. False Editing the remaining base quantity is not allowed. True Editing remaining base quantity is allowed.

Allows user to edit the remaining quantity in dual quantity units. If the dual quantity unit and the dual warehouse quantity unit are the same, this setting is ignored. This parameter can only be configured for dual items. False Editing the remaining dual quantity is not allowed. True Editing the remaining dual quantity is allowed.
